New Records: Boston Celtics improved to 7-1, their best start since the 2019-20 season
Key Match Events: Celtics overwhelmed Hawks in transition with a 35-4 advantage in fast-break points
Hawks didn't score their first fast-break basket until the fourth quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Celtics were highlighted as a powerhouse team likely to challenge for the title
Post-Match Reflections: Celtics are on a strong path toward a title run
Miscellaneous Highlights: Celtics face a tough matchup against the Golden State Warriors next
